title: Boston Red Sox revenue 2001 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 434.0 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 171.0 was reported at Year 2002
